mapper.select: SELECT de.detailid, it.itemid, pu,purchaseid, de.count FROM detail de INNER JOIN item it ON it.itemid = de.itemid INNER JOIN purchase pu ON pu.purchaseid = de.purchaseid WHERE de.detailid = #{detailid}
mapper.update: UPDATE detail itemid = #{itemid}, purchaseid = #{purchaseid} WHERE detailid = #{detailid}
